mapper.insert: insert into member (idx, id, password, name, gender, dateofbirthday, email, phone) values (member_idx_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{dateofbirthday}, #{email}, #{phone})
insert into interlist (interidx, id, interests) values (interlist_interidx_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{interests})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into board (bidx, name, category, ref, subject, content, hit, replycnt) values (board_bidx_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{category}, #{ref}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where ref = 1
